org.sd.cluster.job
Class PostOfficeMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.PostOfficeMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Publishable
public class PostOfficeMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message

A message containing e-mail information that is sent to a post office for collection and distribution by e-mail.

Author:
Spence Koehler

getResponse

public Message getResponse(Context serverContext)
Get this message's response to be returned by the server to the client.

NOTE: this response is returned synchronously from a server to the client after receiving a message. The message as received on the server is handled in its own thread later.

Specified by:
getResponse in interface Message
Parameters:
serverContext - The context of the server responding to this message.

handle

public void handle(Context serverContext)
Handle this message on the server.

NOTE: The message received on a server is handled asynchronously through this method after its response has been sent back to the client.

Specified by:
handle in interface Message
Parameters:
serverContext - The context of the server on which this message is being handled.

write

public void write(java.io.DataOutput dataOutput)
           throws java.io.IOException
Write this message to the dataOutput stream such that this message can be completely reconstructed through this.read(dataInput).

Specified by:
write in interface Publishable
Parameters:
dataOutput - the data output to write to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

read

public void read(java.io.DataInput dataInput)
          throws java.io.IOException
Read this message's contents from the dataInput stream that was written by this.write(dataOutput).

NOTE: this requires all implementing classes to have a default constructor with no args.

Specified by:
read in interface Publishable
Parameters:
dataInput - the data output to write to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
